# Data reading

```{r}
ccpp <- read_csv("data/interim/ccpp.csv", col_types = c("c", "n", rep("c", 7)))
glimpse(ccpp)
```

```{r}
od <- read_csv("data/interim/od-euclidean.csv", col_types = c("c", "c", "n"))
glimpse(od)
```
```{r}
hydrobasins <- unique(ccpp$HydroNameL6)
```

```{r}
graphs <- split(ccpp, ~ HydroNameL6)

for (i in seq_along(graphs)) {
  append(graphs[i], "holi")
}
```
